subject: Re: simsonn pro x ultra
description_text:
hi could you please respond to my emails please as i need help

On Tue, Jan 13, 2026 at 1:50 PM gary poole <garypooles06@gmail.com> wrote:

> hi i have received my pedals but i have a problem with the rgb lights not
> turning of when i power of my pc the rgb lights stay on i have made sure
> that the bios settings are correct and that the erp is off and fast boot in
> bios and windows 10 is set  Uncheck the box for Turn on fast start.
>
> after that it recomends
>
> If these steps do not work, the issue may be with the control box itself.
> In this case, you should contact Simsonn Customer Support
> <https://www.simsonn.com/tools/faq> for further assistance or potential
> hardware replacement.
>
> could you help me please kind regards gary poole
>
>
> Order #SSN5674
>

conversations.body_text:
if i unplug the power cable it goes of when my pc switches of but if the ac
power cable is plugged in it stays on till i unplug it hope that helps.
sorry i should say if the usb is pluged in and ac power cable the lights ho out but with the mains power pluged in it just stays on untill i unplug it from the socket
